data.title: Things to do in Drammen in February – Wanderlog
data.meta_description: Discover events happening in Drammen in February and activities that are perfect for a February trip to Drammen.
data.text:
Overview

February is a good time to visit Drammen. The weather is usually freezing cold, humid but cool, with temperatures ranging from 17—28°F (-8—-2°C).

Drammen has plenty to offer for visitors of all ages and interests. In this article, we tell you the top things to see and do for your February trip to Drammen. Get inspired by the events, activities, attractions, and experiences unique to February. We’ll let you know where to explore events based on your interests, whether that’s food, culture, art, music, sport or others.

We’ll let you know everything you need to prepare for the weather in Drammen in February. Learn about what to wear and pack for your trip, the average temperatures throughout February, temperature changes from morning to evening and much more.

Visiting Drammen? See our Drammen Trip Planner.

Weather in Drammen in February

Temperatures on an average day in Drammen in February

The average temperature in Drammen in February for a typical day ranges from a high of 28°F (-2°C) to a low of 17°F (-8°C). Some would describe it as freezing cold, humid but cool.

For comparison, the hottest month in Drammen, July, has days with highs of 70°F (21°C) and lows of 52°F (11°C). The coldest month, January has days with highs of 26°F (-4°C) and lows of 16°F (-9°C). This graph shows how an average day looks like in Drammen in February based on historical data.

Visiting Drammen? See our Drammen Trip Planner.

What to wear

What to wear in February

With an average high of 28°F (-2°C) and a low of 17°F (-8°C), it generally feels freezing cold, humid but cool. There might also be a small chance of rain. With that in mind, most people would dress in something toasty like a thick winter coat with gloves
